channel.title: Statistics Website for Call of Duty 4?
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm bored so I am making commands for my IRC Bot that parses websites for statistics on xbox live on games. So far I've done halo 3. Now, what I am asking is does Call of Duty 4 have a website for statistics, and if so, could you please post the link. Don't tell me to google as I have. So; Halo 3 is to http://www.bungie.net/Stats/default.aspx as ________ is to Call of Duty 4?

item.title: Statistics Website for Call of Duty 4?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Hey guys, I’m bored so I am making commands for my IRC Bot that parses websites for statistics on xbox live on games. So far I’ve done halo 3.
Now, what I am asking is does Call of Duty 4 have a website for statistics, and if so, could you please post the link.
Don’t tell me to google as I have.
So; Halo 3 is to http://www.bungie.net/Stats/default.aspx as ________ is to Call of Duty 4?

Read full topic
item.source: Statistics Website for Call of Duty 4?
